overview.title: The Deal
overview.content:
OPTIMO Workforce (that's us) takes your privacy seriously. Dead seriously. This policy explains exactly what data we collect, why we need it, and what we do with it. No lawyer speak, no hidden catches.

This covers everyone who touches our platform—restaurant owners crushing it, managers keeping it together, staff getting scheduled fairly, and anyone else whose data crosses our servers.

collection.title: What We Collect (And Why)
collection.content:
Here's what we need to make the magic happen:

**About You:**
• Your name and contact info (so we can, you know, contact you)
• Job details and role (to set proper permissions)
• Employee ID and schedule preferences (for smart scheduling)
• Profile photo if you upload one (to humanize the dashboard)

**About Your Business:**
• Company details and type (to optimize correctly)
• POS data and sales numbers (the fuel for our AI)
• All your scheduling data (to find the patterns)
• Labor costs and metrics (to show you the savings)

**Tech Stuff:**
• IP address and device info (for security)
• How you use our platform (to make it better)
• Cookies that remember you (so you don't re-login 50 times)
• System logs (to fix things when they break)

**Location Bits:**
• Your restaurant addresses (obviously)
• Time zones (so shifts make sense)
• GPS only if you explicitly allow it (for mobile clock-ins)

use.title: What We Do With It
use.content:
Your data works hard to save you money:

**Making the Platform Work:**
• Create those perfect AI-powered schedules
• Predict your busy times with scary accuracy
• Handle payments without the hassle
• Help you when stuff goes sideways

**Making It Better:**
• Spot patterns to improve predictions
• Build features you actually need
• Research what works across restaurants
• Customize your experience

**Keeping You in the Loop:**
• Service updates you need to know
• Answers to your support tickets
• Important changes or downtime notices
• Marketing emails (only if you said yes)

**Keeping It Legal:**
• Following the law (boring but necessary)
• Fighting fraud and hackers
• Enforcing our terms
• Responding to legal stuff (rarely happens)

sharing.title: Who Sees Your Data (Spoiler: Almost Nobody)
sharing.content:
We don't sell your data. Ever. Full stop. Here's who might see it:

**Our Partners (The Good Ones):**
• Cloud providers (AWS, Google—the reliable giants)
• Payment processors (Stripe, PayPal—the trusted ones)
• Analytics tools (anonymized data only)
• Support tools (to help you faster)

**Business Moves:**
• If we merge or get acquired (we'll tell you first)
• During investment talks (under strict NDAs)
• To any successor company (with same protections)

**Legal Stuff:**
• When the law requires it (we fight unreasonable requests)
• Valid court orders (we verify everything)
• To protect our rights or yours
• To keep everyone safe

**When You Say So:**
• Integrations you connect
• Partners you choose
• Sharing you explicitly approve

security.title: How We Protect Your Stuff
security.content:
We're paranoid about security (in a good way):

**Digital Fort Knox:**
• Military-grade AES-256 encryption everywhere
• Multi-factor authentication on all accounts
• Regular hacker tests (ethical ones)
• Rate-limited APIs (stops brute force attacks)

**Human Safeguards:**
• Background checks on our team
• Need-to-know access only
• Regular security training
• Incident response drills

**Physical Security:**
• Data centers with armed guards
• Biometric scanners
• Climate-controlled environments
• Multiple backup locations

**Compliance Badges:**
• SOC 2 Type II (the hard one)
• GDPR and CCPA compliant
• PCI DSS Level 1 (for payments)
• Third-party audits quarterly

retention.title: How Long We Keep It
retention.content:
We're not data hoarders. Here's our retention policy:

**Your Account:**
• Active: We keep it while you're with us
• Inactive: Auto-deleted after 3 years of silence
• Deleted: Gone within 30 days, guaranteed

**Business Records:**
• Schedules: 7 years (labor law requirements)
• Financial: Whatever tax law demands
• Analytics: Anonymized and kept forever

**Legal Minimums:**
• Employment records: Per your local laws
• Tax documents: Per your tax authority
• Audit trails: 7 years standard

**Your Requests:**
• Delete requests: Done in 30 days
• Data exports: Delivered in 30 days
• Account closure: Processed in 7 days

transfers.title: When Data Travels
transfers.content:
We're global, so sometimes your data takes trips:

**How We Move It:**
• Standard Contractual Clauses (EU-approved)
• Adequacy decisions (where applicable)
• Your consent (when needed)
• Contract necessity (to deliver service)

**Where It Lives:**
• Main servers: US (AWS Virginia)
• Backups: EU (AWS Ireland)
• Processing: US and Ireland
• Support: US and Philippines

**Protection En Route:**
• Encrypted during every transfer
• Regular mechanism reviews
• Local law compliance everywhere
• You're notified of any changes

children.title: Kids and Privacy
children.content:
Our platform is for working professionals:

**Age Rules:**
• Minimum age: 16 years
• Under 18: Need parental permission
• Age verified at signup
• Underage accounts deleted immediately

**Extra Protection for Minors:**
• Enhanced privacy defaults
• Limited data collection
• Parental access rights
• Regular process reviews

**Legal Compliance:**
• COPPA compliant (US)
• GDPR Article 8 (EU)
• Local age laws respected
• Team trained on youth privacy

changes.title: When This Policy Changes
changes.content:
We'll always tell you first:

**How We Notify:**
• Email to all users
• Big banner on the website
• In-app notifications
• 30-day warning for big changes

**Version History:**
• Every version saved
• Changes clearly marked
• Effective dates shown
• Old versions available

**Your Choices:**
• Keep using = you accept
• Questions? Just ask
• Exercise your rights anytime
• Don't like it? Delete anytime
